oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War reunion pins and badges of Sgt. Charles Ward, Co. E, 60th Ind. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These reunion pins and badges belonged to Sgt. Charles Ward, who served in Co. E, 60th Ind. Inf. Regt., USA during the Civil War. Born in 1841 in England, his family settled in Indiana. His draft registration lists him as a blacksmith. He later settled in White County, Ill. and died in 1920. See also wmca090 and wmca092.
